org.greatage.ioc.proxy
Class AbstractInvocationHandler<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.greatage.ioc.proxy.AbstractInvocationHandler<T>
Type Parameters:
T - delegate type
Direct Known Subclasses:
CGLibInvocationHandler, JavassistInvocationHandler, JdkInvocationHandler
public abstract class AbstractInvocationHandler<T>
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents utility for lazy creation of object from object builder.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Ivan Khalopik
